programme.title: Aurora Teagarden Mysteries
programme.desc: Just days before Aurora's wedding, a body is discovered, and she fears her father may be a suspect; she and Nick race to solve the cold case before they walk down the aisle.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche reunites with her daughter Rebecca after a four-year estrangement; Blanche wants to defend her from an abusive boyfriend.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy hocks an expensive ring to pay off the debt she and her ex-husband owe to the Internal Revenue Service.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy, Rose and Blanche seek professional help when living with one another becomes unbearable.

programme.desc: Rose decides to move in with Buddy Rourke, one of her deceased husband's former buddies.

programme.desc: Reba discovers that her husband is leaving her for his pregnant girlfriend and that her 17-year-old daughter is pregnant as well.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba takes a stand when a pregnant Cheyenne is kicked out of high school but Van is allowed to stay to help the football team make the championships.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba discovers that her daughter's obstetrician will also be delivering the baby of her ex-husband's mistress.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Cheyenne tries to hide her morning sickness from Van; Reba's neighbor refuses to let her son sleep over.

programme.desc: Frasier has Niles hire a legal shark (Saul Rubinek) to help with his divorce but fears having to testify.

programme.desc: Niles plays matchmaker when Roz's former boyfriend (Saul Rubinek) becomes involved with Daphne.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Temperamental caterers, nit-picky preparations and feuding almost foil Frasier's tasteful dinner party.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Niles and Frasier throw a reception to prove that Niles is respectable.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Carla's daughter announces she is pregnant and is going to marry the father; Carla's ex-husband and his wife show up at the wedding.

programme.desc: Kyra does not want to spend time with her father since it includes Barbra Jean; Cheyenne and Van plan to move out.

programme.desc: The women reflect on their years spent together when Sophia announces she is going to live with her son.

programme.desc: A jilted art gallery manager takes her honeymoon cruise solo and meets a charming prince posing as a European gentleman, who shares her passion for art.

programme.title: Love on the Danube: Kissing Stars
programme.desc: A publicist and a movie star's professional collaboration leads to an unexpected romance on a cruise.

programme.title: Polar Opposites
programme.desc: Emma needs to get to Antarctica to reach her father and travels to South America but can't get on a boat for the last leg. She sneaks onto a cruise ship and meets engineer Andy.

programme.title: The Sweetest Christmas
programme.desc: A struggling pastry chef is thrilled to learn that she has made it to the finals of the American Gingerbread Competition, but distractions in her love life threaten to derail her dreams of taking home the grand prize.

programme.desc: When estranged siblings Lindsay and Brad Morgan travel to Scotland at Christmas to reunite with their mother Jo, a big family secret is revealed.
